relatedRecords.name: NE RPC
relatedRecords.description: NE RPC is a community-organised, free-to-attend virtual conference, showcasing speakers from the North East of England. We’ll be hosting a day of 30-minute talks, covering a wide variety of tech subjects. Whether bleeding-edge or tried-and-tested, we’re listening!

relatedRecords.name: DevCon Live
relatedRecords.description: Inspired by the DevTalks network, DevCon is a premium event designed around a 3-days experience where senior IT professionals gather to share their best inputs and experiences and connect to the latest trends in technology and contribute to the future of the tech industry.
